11.title: Anna

choices: You Ask Alisa to Introduce Herself to the Outside World
You Wish for Anna's Belly to Expand
112.content:
JANE POV
____________________________________________________________________________ __
You wake up, confused as to why you lack any recent memory.

“Unh… what… where… am I?” You quietly moan, pressing a hand out to feel your surroundings. You notice your hand is pressing into something that gives in easily, feeling rather fleshy.

“I was wondering when you’d wake up.” You hear a muffled feminine voice speak, before feeling something press back against your hand.

You slowly open your eyes, finding your surroundings to be as fleshy as it felt, filled with a strange liquid you can still breathe in. Even though the room is dim, you can still see everything within the rounded walls.

“H-hey! Let me out of here!” You scream, pressing your foot outwards.

“Anna, I think it’s about time you loosened up in your office just a tiny bit.” A different feminine voice says, before a certain part of the wall pushes in, killing some space.

You hear a slight shuffling sound outside the walls as you press your against the indentation.

“Yoshiko… great… now she’ll never get back to sleep.” The voice you assume is Anna complains as a giant hand shape presses inwards.

You press your foot out farther, the handprint immediately disappearing.

“Huh?!” Anna sounds alert.

“Wow… it’s like a horror movie!” The woman you assume is Yoshiko giggles. “Watch out, she’s coming out of your belly!”

“Seriously, my belly feels like it’s about to explode…” The handprint returns, shifting across the walls.

“HEY! CAN YOU HEAR ME?!” You cry out again, hearing no response.

“Her brother was just kicking on my way here, though not like that.” Yoshiko says as you kick the exact same spot repeatedly.

You feel a strange sensation in your belly button, as if something is going through it. You look down, finding a long, fleshy tube is wedged inside of it.

“What is this?” You ask out loud.

“An umbilical cord?” A third feminine voice makes you jump, mostly due to how clear and loud it is.

You look up, finding pink mist materializing, forming into the shape of a curvy woman, before the mist began to change into several colors. The mist turns into a fleshy color, before additional mist covers the torso and legs, turning into a red color.

“W-what are you?!” You ask in fear as you watch the mist shape into a face, turning into a fleshy color.

“This probably isn’t the best way for me to present myself,” She says as she turns into a woman in a bellydancer’s outfit, “but I am Alisa.”

“H-Hi…” You are unsure of how to react to this new development.

“Let me cut to the chase, I’m a genie.” She snaps her fingers together, merging her legs back together.

You notice the walls start to indent outward in sporadic spots, one at a time, before falling back in. Additional spots push outward again.

“As far as they know, you’re still kicking up a storm in here.”

“W-where is here?!” You ask the genie.

“Well.. you’re in the uterus of a woman named Anna Kita. She’s pregnant… with you!”

Your jaw drops in disbelief, “B-but… that’s impossible! Last time I remember…” Your memories start to fade back into your mind, “I was pregnant! I was having a little boy!”

“Yes, well… you found a magical amulet, and, well… long story short, you were separated from your unborn son. But you two will be reunited in no time!”

“W-what do you mean?” You ask in confusion.

“Your life is essentially rebooting. You’ll be going through infancy, puberty, etcetera, etcetera. All for a second time. But Misses Kita here is married to Yoshiko, who is pregnant with your son.”

“How is SHE pregnant with MY son?!” You shout in anger.

Alisa’s hands start to glow, and you suddenly feel more relaxed.

“Well, you two wound up in their uteruses. So, now your son will be your brother.
____________________________________________________________________________ __
ANNA POV
____________________________________________________________________________ __
Jane is straightening paperwork on her massive desk, when she feels a hand press out in her belly.

Looking down, she smiles, “I was wondering when you’d wake up.” She warmly places a hand where the baby is pushing out, before returning to the paperwork.

“Knock knock.” A woman says, entering the office and quickly shutting the door.

Looking up to make sure the door is closed, Anna smiles, “Hi, sweetie.”

“Just got back from the appointment.” The woman has long, dark brown hair, and seems to be rather short, standing at five feet tall. She unbuttons her overcoat, letting a bare, pregnant belly fall out.

“And?” Anna looks up, anticipating the news.

“The DNA tests were in. Not only are they our biological children, but they’re also direct siblings.” The woman that entered rubs her belly.

“Yoshiko… didn’t the lab say that something ‘accidentally’ leaked into our coffee, resulting in the both of us getting pregnant?” Anna asks, putting the paperwork down.

“That’s what they told us. But c’mon, Anna. You should really take maternity leave.” Yoshiko leans against Anna’s desk.

“Yoshiko, I really can’t, I’ve got too much stuff to do, I don’t think staying at home is going to help much…” Anna sighs.

“Anna, I think it’s time you loosened up in your office just a tiny bit.” Yoshiko reaches out, pointing Anna in her popped out belly button.

Anna unbuttons her jacket and pulls her blouse up, exposing her fleshy dome.

“Yoshiko…” Anna starts as a foot presses against her belly button. “Great… now she’ll never get back to sleep.”

“But it’s so cute when she moves restlessly. Can’t believe your belly button is the switch that does it.” Yoshiko giggles.

The baby’s foot presses further outward against Anna’s belly button, causing alert for Anna.

“Huh?!” Anna stares down in awe.

“Wow… it’s like a horror movie!” Yoshiko continues to giggle. “Watch out, she’s coming out of your belly!”

“Seriously, it feels like my belly is about to explode…” Anna starts to rub her belly, praying she can calm the raging beast within.

“Her brother was just kicking on my way here, though not like that.” Yoshiko says as Anna’s baby keeps kicking her navel, each kick reaching out rather far. “Tell me, what does it feel like?”

“What do you mean ‘what does it feel like?’ That little guy kicks away too!” Anna responds in frustration.

“No, I mean what does this specific time feel like? She’s never done THIS before.” Yoshiko pokes Anna’s belly button as the baby reaches further and further.

The kick falls down quickly, only for another to reach out even further.

“Seriously, she wants out, doesn’t she?” Yoshiko observes.

“Well, if only I could give birth out of my belly button. But sadly, if this were a movie, the closest thing I’d get is my belly exploding like it’s Alien or something.” Anna stares at her belly, watching the kick drop, anticipating another to reach even farther.

That never happened, as recurrent fetal movement became sporadic.

“I wonder what was going on that she decided your belly button was the paper high school football players run through at the start of their games.” Yoshiko stares down at Anna’s belly, finding the movement to be more relaxed.

“I don’t know, but I hope that if it ever happens again, it’s during a checkup so I can get back at the lab.” Anna rests a hand on her bare belly.
____________________________________________________________________________ __
JANE POV
____________________________________________________________________________ __
“By the way, just to remind you, I’m a genie. I can grant wishes.” Alisa speaks to you.

“Really? Then I want out of here, and my son back.” You fold your arms together.

“I never said I was a powerful genie. My powers are very limited, but go ahead and make a wish, and I’ll see if it’s possible.” She suddenly smirks. "And I'm aware of what kind of person you were during your pregnancy, so don't be afraid to ask for any wish. I'll grant those within my power, we just have to figure out what is and isn't yet."
112.title: Jane

choices: The Summoning is Happening Right Here, Right Now!
Wait Until the Middle of the Night, It'll be Hilarious!
1121.content:
“I want you to present yourself to the outside world. But let me give you details, so I can know that there won’t be any tricks.” You tell Alisa.

“I’m all ears.” Alisa slouches over, disappointed with your clever decision making.

“I want Anna’s belly to turn into a lamp. And I remember her saying she feels like her belly will explode… so everytime you’re summoned, make it so she gets a good scare the first time around. But only she and Yoshiko can summon you, and they have to rub Anna’s belly. But it can only work when her belly is bare, if it’s clothed, you stay. If her belly is exposed and a stranger rubs it, nothing happens, some creep just rubs her belly.”

“I see.” Alisa puts a hand over her chin, listening to the details.

“And make it so they can add trusted people that can summon you. BUT!” You suddenly come up with something. “You can only be summoned on purpose. She can’t just be rubbing her belly without thinking and then you pop out of her belly button. Oh, and try to talk her into summoning you through a non-pregnant woman every now and then.”

“Why?” Alisa asks. “And how?”

“Just make the woman’s belly expand, then pop out of her belly button as you would with Anna.”

“Okay, so I’m going to demonstrate what the summoning would look like with my belly, before going outside.” Alisa says.

“Okay, show me what you’ve got.” You lean forward, a smile growing on your face.

Alisa closes her eyes, before her belly starts to grow rapidly, mimicking a woman nine months pregnant. “This is how big Anna should be.”

“Okay.” You lean in closer as Alisa rubs her newfound swell.

“I can feel everything that’s happening in my belly…” Alisa stares down at it as something pokes out at her belly button.

“Wait! Make it so it’s always painless!” You cry out.

“Any last minute requests for the wish?” Alisa asks as something jabs at her belly button rather hard.

“Actually, make it so her belly does certain things in no pattern whatsoever. It’s all shuffled and randomized. First, what’s happening right now with belly button jabs, will be the first ever summon.”

The jabs at Alisa’s belly button keep reaching farther and farther.

“What else did you have in mind?” Alisa asks as mist finally pours out from her belly button, the thrusting immediately ceasing.

“On second thought…” You begin to change your mind, “Don’t just do belly button jabs. Do EVERYTHING for the first time.” You smile.

“What else did you have planned?” Alisa asks, rubbing her belly.

“So… how about the belly jumping around?” You ask.

Alisa’s belly starts to move around with a mind of its own, as if trying to pry itself off of her. “Like so?”

“Yes!”

“What else?” Alisa’s belly returns to its calm state.

“How about…” You start, “Several smaller kicks at once?”

Ceaseless movement quickly erupts in Alisa’s belly, “Like so?” She asks.

“Hmm… how about they reach a little farther?” You ask.

The kicks each reach out slightly more, “Perfect! Now, how about big thrusts? Like it’s tackling its way out?”

Alisa snaps her fingers, her belly struggling to withhold the magic she purposely manipulated to attempt to escape from its prison.

“Is that all?” Alisa asks.

“No… finally… her belly expands!” You point at Alisa as her swollen dome proceeds to grow.

“So, did you want a specific time?” Alisa asks as her belly stops growing, immediately shrinking back to its original flat form.

“Well…”
1121.title: You Ask Alisa to Introduce Herself to the Outsi...

choices: Make It So Another Baby Could Fit
Make It So I Could Fit Two More Roomies!
1122.content:
“Well… I could always use more room…” You suggest as you feel Anna’s womb suddenly move upward, meaning she has stood up.

“Here come the lab geeks.” You hear Yoshiko say as you feel the womb change position,

You kick the spot you had kicked repeatedly, quickly hearing “There she goes, treating my navel like a punching bag again…”

With this new position, you figure out that you have been kicking her belly button, and it is now facing upward.

You look at Alisa, whose ear is pressed against the uterine wall.

“Hmm… it seems her shirt’s still lifted up, keeping kicking her belly button while I grant your wish. Any size requests?” Alisa shoots you an evil grin.

“Hmm…” You fold your arms, thinking.
1122.title: You Could Always Have More Room

11221.content:
JANE POV
____________________________________________________________________________ __
“Make it so another baby could fit!”

“Your wish is my command!” Alisa snaps her fingers as her grin grows wider.
____________________________________________________________________________ __
ANNA POV
____________________________________________________________________________ __
“Yoshiko, I’m having my appointment in here before we head out.” Anna says as she puts a cap on a pen.

Yoshiko opens the door, peeking outside, before swinging the it almost shut, “Here come the lab geeks.”

Sighing, Anna stands up, her bare belly standing above the desk it was hiding behind.

“Hmm?” Anna looks down at her belly.

“What is it?” Yoshiko asks, letting go of the door.

“It feels like… there’s something in there…” Anna moves toward the couch that was gifted to her by the lab.

“Umm, yeah, the baby.” Yoshiko giggles.

“No. I mean- it feels like there’s something pressing against my skin, but… it feels like it’s something else besides the baby…” Anna lies down on the couch.

“You’re just paranoid. The baby’s just in a weird position.” Yoshiko rubs her bare belly as a woman in a parted lab coat enters.

“Anna Kita? Time for your ultrasound.” The woman says, placing a hand on her own pregnant belly as well.

The baby quickly starts to kick at Anna’s belly button once again, “There she goes, treating my navel like a punching bag again…”

“Hmph!” The woman in the lab coat tries to hold in a chuckle, “You’ll be alright.” She pulls out a doppler, immediately sticking the transducer on Anna’s belly. “Hmm…” She listens carefully to the heartbeat, before putting the transducer back into her coat pocket.

“That’s it?” Anna asks, sitting up.

“Yep, the actual ultrasound’s tomorrow.” The woman in the lab coat immediately waddles to the door.

“B-But I’m in a meeting tomorrow!” Anna says, rubbing her belly button, Jane’s kicking failing to cease.

“Well, guess we’ll do it then. You just focus on your bigwig conversations, pay us no mind while we prod your gut. Besides, you could use it as your presentation on the fertility treatment.” The woman in the lab coat leaves Anna’s office.

“Grr…” Anna groans in frustration.

“Hey, sweetie, c’mon, let’s just go home… tonight and tomorrow night, I’ll make it so you can forget all about the meeting.” Yoshiko moves in for a kiss.

“Wait.” Anna puts her hand in her wife’s face, her concentration falling on her belly.

“What is it?” Yoshiko looks at her wife, a mask of concern creeping onto her face.

“It’s my belly… do you think… you could drive tonight?” Anna asks as her skin starts to tighten.

“Are you… are you having contractions?!” Yoshiko asks out loud.

“Shh! Keep it down! If I want that promotion bigger than this belly, I’m going to that meeting tomorrow, there’s no way this baby’s escaping my belly! Now, let’s go home.” Anna forces herself up as she moved toward the door, the need for balance shoved aside.

“If you say so…” Yoshiko swiftly follows her wife out of her office.

“Hoo… hoo… hoo…” Anna quickly runs out of breath as she passes by a break room, leaning against a wall.

“Anna, your belly isn’t giving me the best of vibes right now…”

“My belly isn’t giving good vibes?” Anna asks. “My belly is growing a baby in it. My belly is making me cry at the littlest things. My belly feels like it’s about to blow. My belly feels sensitive. My belly is constantly demanding food. My belly tingles whenever my shirts shift just by a hair- hoo… hoo… hoo…” She catches herself. “Yoshiko, I’m… I’m sorry.”

“Hey, don’t be. Every woman has mood swings during pregnancy.” Yoshiko puts a hand on her wife’s shoulder.

“I… I just… maybe I wasn’t meant to have a baby.” Anna sadly resigns.

“Anna!” Yoshiko says. “We’ll continue this in the car.”

The couple silently walk out to their car, getting in and buckling up.

“Anna, we’re going to be great parents, and plus, you’re clearly made to have a baby.” Yoshiko says as she pulls out of the parking lot.

“Yoshiko…” Anna grunts as she feels another wave of discomfort. “My mood swings… they’ve been rather extreme.”

“Anna, every pregnant woman has mood swings, again. Some are lighter than others, some are worse off than others. But look down at your belly. You’re huge!”

“Oh, thanks, hon.” Anna feels slightly insulted, before remembering her wife loves her size.

“No, no, no. The baby’s big, the baby is healthy. Clearly, you’re made to bear children. If you’re doing this for the first one at thirty, imagine if you had gotten pregnant ten years ago!”

Anna slowly lifts up her shirt to expose her belly. She gently touches the sensitive skin.
_____JANE POV_____
“What’s taking so long?” You ask impatiently. You had stopped kicking moments ago as nothing had happened yet.

“Sorry, it’s just a wish of this caliber, well, I haven’t really prepared for. So, I’m charging up the wish.” Alisa is holding a ball of pink mist in her hands. “I’ll let you know when it’s ready.”
_____ANNA POV_____
Anna waddles into her home, throwing her jacket onto the couch.

“Man… my belly won’t stop bothering me…” Anna plops down on her couch, not caring that she landed on her jacket.

“Are you sure you’re okay?” Yoshiko looks at her wife in concern.

“Yes, I’m sure.”
_____JANE POV_____
“Done!” Alisa suddenly claps her hands together, crushing the mist ball.
_____ANNA POV_____
“Nngh…” Anna groans as her belly gurgles loudly, before she feels her skin tighten.

“A-Anna?” Yoshiko stares in horror at the strangest sight.

Anna’s belly starts to swell outward!

“Ooh… help me…” She groans in discomfort.

As quickly as it started, the growth ended, leaving Anna looking like she is due with twins.
_____JANE POV_____
“Well, what next?” Alisa looks to you.
11221.title: Make It So Another Baby Could Fit

1123.content:
JANE POV
____________________________________________________________________________ __
“I wanna see the outside world.” You say to Alisa.

“I can’t make it permanent, but I can give you some decent time.” Alisa snaps her fingers, the uterine walls suddenly fading into transparency. “Huh, that’s odd. I swore Anna was in her office.”

As the walls fade, you can see a woman’s hand resting above you, before you face forward to see a mirror.

“She’s… she’s beautiful…” You gasp as you finally see Anna with your own eyes. You see the world is upside down as Anna sits on an upside down bed, in a white two piece bikini to your liking!

“Do you like what you see?” Alisa asks as you keep staring at the woman in the mirror.

“I… Ye- ... I… why are we upside down?” You turn to Alisa, finding her flipping herself over.

“Actually, my head is now facing the ceiling, and you’re upside down for good reason. You’ve turned, meaning you’re gonna be born within a couple weeks, unless you’d like to change that.”

You immediately start to think, before your concentration is broken.“You know… I never planned on having you…” You hear Anna say.

“Wait… what?” You ask in confusion.

“In fact, I never planned on children, ever. Hell, I never even planned on marriage. It was just going to be me, myself, and my career.”

“So… what is she saying? Is she just going to give me up for adoption?” You ask.

“My powers aren’t strong enough to figure out where’s she’s going yet, for now, we have to wait and see where she goes.” Alisa shrugs as you look back at the mirror.

“But then I met your mother… well… your non-birth mother… err… argh, what am I looking for? Well, it’s all very complicated, but I met her, then things changed. I still never planned on a baby, though. It was just going to be Yoshiko, me, and our careers, then spending the rest of our lives together in retirement.”

Anna scoots back on the bed, lying back against some pillows.

“But then, the labs decided to put your brother in Yoshiko, and you in me, without our permission. At first, I was livid, and in fact, I wanted you transferred to another mother. But now…” Anna takes a breath. “I want to be one of those moms that balances their career with family life. I honestly feel like you and your brother were given to Yoshiko and I for a reason. Heck, I may even give you two a baby brother or sister in a couple years.”

Anna places her hand over her popped out belly button. Touched by her speech to you, you reach out, pressing your hand against hers, her belly being the only thing separating you two.
____________________________________________________________________________ __
ANNA POV
____________________________________________________________________________ __
“Anna, you look like you could use some time in the hot tub.” Yoshiko puts her hand on Anna’s shoulder as she releases her seatbelt. “Or at least actual maternity wear.”

“I don’t need maternity wear. My belly’s big, but the clothes I have now can handle.” Anna gets out of her car and shuts the door, immediately walking to their front door. Despite the size of her belly, she has yet to waddle at any point in her pregnancy.

“Then why do you always tuck your belly under your desk and pull your shirt up when you’re at work when the baby starts kicking?” Yoshiko asks as she and her wife enter their house, Anna immediately plopping down onto the couch.

“Well, pregnant women are sexy.” Anna shrugs.

“You’re too professional to try to be sexy at work. You know your buttons won’t last when the baby kicks.”

“I’m going to have to disagree, babe.” Anna says as she pulls her glasses off her face, setting them gently on an end table.

“Prove it.” Yoshiko says as she pulls off her overcoat, her belly immediately dropping from its confines.

“Prove what?” Anna asks, looking up at her wife.

“Without lifting your shirt, make the baby kick. I wanna see your shirt survive.”

“You know what? Fine.” Anna says as she pulls her jacket up, pressing into her belly.

Both Anna and Yoshiko stare at Anna’s belly in anticipation, before a gentle stretch reaches out from the side of the belly.

“See?” Anna brags as Yoshiko bends over to stare at Anna’s belly.

“Wow… you weren’t lying-”

Yoshiko flinches as a popped button smacks her in the middle of her forehead, taking Anna by shock.

“Grr…”

“You need to take a dip in the ‘tub.” Yoshiko smiles as she pokes Anna’s now-exposed belly button.

Mumbling nonsense to herself, Anna begins to unbutton her shirt as she walks into their bedroom, her skirt quickly falling to the floor.

Quickly naked, Anna pulls out a white two-piece bikini from her dresser, putting it on with relative ease. She sits down on the bed, facing the mirror, hands on the edge of the mattress.

“You know… I never planned on having you…” Anna sighs, talking to herself. In fact, I never planned on children, ever. Hell, I never even planned on marriage. It was just going to be me, myself, and my career.” Anna confesses with slight guilt.

Anna glances at her reflection’s swollen middle, as though the unborn child within could hear.

“But then I met your mother… well… your non-birth mother… err… argh, what am I looking for? Well, it’s all very complicated, but I met her, then things changed. I still never planned on a baby, though. It was just going to be Yoshiko, me, and our careers, then spending the rest of our lives together in retirement.”

Anna scoots back onto the bed, lying back on some pillows.

“But then, the labs decided to put your brother in Yoshiko, and you in me, without our permission. At first, I was livid, and in fact, I wanted you transferred to another mother. But now…” She takes a breath, “I want to be one of those moms that balances her career with family life. I honestly feel like you and your brother were given to Yoshiko and I for a reason. Heck, I may even give you two a baby brother or sister in a couple years.”

Anna places her hand over her popped out belly button, just wanting to connect with the life underneath. Then, as though the baby understood what she just said, Anna feels the baby reach out and press a hand against hers. Anna gasps as...
____________________________________________________________________________ __
JANE POV
____________________________________________________________________________ __
You look at Alisa, and start to open your mouth to speak...
1123.title: You Want to See Outside

11231.content:
“Not right now… I think I’ll play with Anna for a little bit.” You say to Alisa as you stare up at Anna’s hand.

“Phew…” Alisa sighs in relief, “My magic’s starting to weaken anyhow, go ahead and play while I recover. However, there is a side effect to that wish that you’ll be seeing in a minute.”

“What side effect?” You ask in concern.

“It doesn’t affect YOU directly… rather, Anna.”
____________________________________________________________________________ __
ANNA POV
____________________________________________________________________________ __
“You know, I’ve never been sure why, but you’ve always loved my belly button.” Anna speaks to her belly as her baby presses against her hand.

She breathes in, sucking in her belly slightly as her belly button retracts into her.
____________________________________________________________________________ __
JANE POV
____________________________________________________________________________ __
“What’s happening?! Is she having a contraction?!” You ask as the walls of the womb start to close in slightly.

“No, she’s just sucking in her belly. Apparently her belly button made it this far when she was naturally this size.” Alisa points at a new indent.

“Is she poking her belly button?” You ask, the indent looking rather deep.

“No, that’s how deep her belly button was. But when she let’s go…”
____________________________________________________________________________ __
ANNA POV
____________________________________________________________________________ __
Anna starts frantically panting as she holds her breath too long, her belly quickly jumping out.

“Guess I… overdid it… that time… eh?” Anna asks her unborn child as her container quickly swells and deflates with each breath. “Women’s bellies aren’t meant to be held in that long… not when they’re growing children inside.”

“Anna? You okay?” Yoshiko pokes her head into the bedroom door.

“Yes, dear… Just tried sucking my belly in a little bit.”

“You trying to suck your belly button back in?”

“Jane really does love it when my belly button is involved in play…” Anna grumbles.

“As do I!” Yoshiko gently lowers herself onto the bed, kissing Anna’s navel. “So… please don’t get mad at me, but… I kinda taught Jane a new trick.”

“You taught John a trick?” Anna asks her wife in confusion.

“No, Jane. Y’know, the one in your belly.” Yoshiko pokes Anna’s belly.

“How’d you do that?” Anna asks Yoshiko in disbelief.

“I did it while you were sleeping. I’d just peel the covers back, then treat your belly like a magic crystal ball. Tell me, do you know what today is? And not the day of the week or the date.”

“No? I’ve been very busy with work, and I know it’s not our anniversary.” Anna looks at her wife.

“Oh, well, let me show you.” Yoshiko takes her index finger on her right hand and pokes Anna’s belly. “Oh, wait, let me make a surprise…” She takes her left hand and covers her wife’s eyes.

“Okay, Yoshiko, I’ll bite, show me.”
____________________________________________________________________________ __
JANE POV
____________________________________________________________________________ __
“Oh no… I forgot…”

“What? What is it?” You ask Alisa in fear, wondering if something wrong was happening.

“Quick, Yoshiko is about to trace something on Anna’s belly, with a few seconds delay, you must retrace what she does.” You feel your foot move toward the new indent in the uterine walls without your input.

“Whoa! Okay, gimme a heads up first!”
____________________________________________________________________________ __
ANNA POV
____________________________________________________________________________ __
“Done!” Yoshiko says as she uncovers Anna’s eyes, “You know your skin marks slightly whenever she swipes, so look carefully.” Yoshiko says as her wife’s attention falls on her belly.

“I…” Anna starts, reading what Jane is tracing from within, “Lo...ve… You-” Anna gasps as she witnesses the final message being written, “Happy Birthday…”

“Happy birthday, babe.” Yoshiko turns herself onto her side to face her wife more comfortably.

“I… I…” Anna is having a hard time speaking, before she quickly pulls her wife in for a kiss.

“That’s quite an unusual thank you from you.” Yoshiko smirks as she pulls away. “Anna Kita, my wife, today is your thirtieth birthday. I know that we fight sometimes, but that’s what married couples do. We fight, cool down, then come back to fix the problem. I know the unexpected pregnancies by the lab didn’t seem like blessings, but they’re ultimately blessings in disguise. Look down at our bellies, we’re holding two beautiful blessings in disguise in them. Meeting you, however, wasn’t a blessing in disguise. It wasn’t even in disguise, it was just upfront. We’re a family, and this family going to grow like than our bellies. I know you don’t like being sappy on the outside, but I just wanna give you another reminder: I love you.”

Tears start to well up in Anna’s eyes as she pulls Yoshiko in for a hug, “I love you, too!”
____________________________________________________________________________ __
JANE POV
____________________________________________________________________________ __
“Wow…” You listen in awe. “Maybe… stumbling across that magic wasn’t such a bad thing after all.”

“Yes, it’s honestly quite surprising how Anna’s still having you.” Alisa stares into space.

“What do you mean?” You ask Alisa.

Anna could not help but giggle.

“There once were two beautiful women named Anna and Yoshiko, no relation, of course. They had very flat bellies, and would show them off, as they were queens. “So, they brought the villagers in to rub their bellies again, hoping it would make the monsters go away. Sadly, their bellies popped as the monsters were born, and their souls wandered around the world for a thousand years, before Yoshiko’s landed in a woman’s belly, her last name was Kita, while Anna landed in another woman’s belly.”

Then, I met Anna. With her magical belly button, she drew the monster out from mine, and trapped the monster in her belly!”

"What should I do?" Alisa asked John magically.

John thought about it. He didn't know how far Alisa's magic could reach or what it could do, but if she could appear outside of his mother's womb, then she must have some pretty wide powers after all.

"Give Amber a pregnant belly," he said. "It's too bad I won't be able to see it too, but as long as everyone else gets to have access to your amazing womb and pregnancy magic."

"Done" Alisa said, snapping her fingers. Amber felt a jolt and grabbed her belly. The gathered crowd gasped as Amber's own belly swelled, easily passing her clothes. It was round, smooth, and bare. In just seconds, she was just as pregnant as Elizabeth and was stroking her belly eagerly.

"Oh my god!" Amber cried, her whole face turning red. "I'm pregnant! Look at me! I've got such a big belly!"

"You sure do," Elizabeth gulped. She was both amazed by the sight and by the reality before her: there was a genie living inside her womb who was giving out wishes. It also took her back a little to see someone as pregnant as her. It made Elizabeth realize just how big she was.

"So, I'm sure you all believe me now," Alisa said, turning back to Elizabeth. "Unfortunately, my powers are a little strained for the moment, so I may not be able to stay out here much longer."

"But...why are you inside my belly?" Elizabeth asked, running her hands over the massive orb of flesh in question. Alisa thought over her response and checked in with John.

"Should I tell your mother yet? I can't do anything like that without you wishing it."

John thought it over again. This was all happening so fast, but he was getting extremely excited. "No, not yet. Let's keep everything a secret for now. But I wish I could see outside of the womb so I can see my sis...my big sis now...with her pregnant belly."

Alisa nodded and once again, the womb walls faded away and he could see from belly-level at the baby shower. Amber was rubbing her bare pregnant belly happily, her face bright red. John gulped with glee. She looked amazing, just like his own pregnant mother. His pregnant mother whose womb he was growing inside. And unlike his mother, he could see Amber's bare belly. And it was amazing. If he could just see Elizabeth's bare belly too...

The view outside faded away and John was back inside the womb. And thanks to his earlier wish, now he was alone while Alisa entertained the baby shower's guests.

---Elizabeth's POV---

Elizabeth was stunned by what was happening. A bizarre magical woman came out of her pregnant belly and turned her own daughter pregnant! In an instant! This was impossible, but Elizabeth felt much more confused by the fact that it was her belly the genie came out of. What was so special about her belly? Sure, it might have been an unexpected pregnancy. Elizabeth thought she was too old to be pregnant. But she'd honestly always planned on having four kids. 18 years ago, she tried to have a baby, but didn't end up getting pregnant. Then she stopped trying and didn't start again until later. And that's how she got Amber.

And now, that same daughter was pregnant! Elizabeth felt a twinge of guilt. The last thing she'd said to her daughter was a taunt about her becoming pregnant one day. Sure, Elizabeth wanted her daughter to share in the joy of pregnancy one day, but not a minute later! And especially not to be just as pregnant as herself!

"Hey, I asked you something!" Elizabeth said to Alisa, a bit of fear in her voice. "Why did you come out of my belly?"

"I'm afraid I can't answer that just yet," Alisa replied. "But I can tell you that I mean you no harm. In fact, as long as I'm out here, I'm here to serve you. I can grant wishes related to pregnancy, to a degree. I have limits."

"Limits like what?" Mary asked. Just like Elizabeth, she was stunned but readily believing in the genie.

Alisa shrugged. "I can't know until you test them."

Meanwhile, Amber was still rubbing her belly happily. She'd always fantasized about pregnancy and being pregnant one day. She didn't want kids, but a big belly: definitely. Amber's fetish started when Elizabeth was pregnant with Anna, her youngest child, but over the course of Elizabeth's current pregnancy, Amber's attraction and interest flourished. She'd sneak peeks of her pregnant mother whenever she could, offer belly rubs, even listen to the movement inside her belly.

And now, she had a big belly of her own! Amber did worry that she'd have a baby to raise now but...her mother would help her with that too. She could just tell people that Amber's baby was actually hers. After all, Elizabeth looked big enough to be carrying twins. And so do I, Amber giggled to herself. If I was actually carrying twins I would just...ooh~"

"Amber?" Elizabeth said with concern. Amber stopped and composed herself, walking back near the rest of the group.

"Yes, mom?"

"Do you feel okay?"

Amber nodded. "I feel fine, I guess. Just...heavier and fuller."

Elizabeth sighed. "Sounds like a normal pregnancy. I guess you lived up to your promise...and she did ask you to prove that you are a genie. Can you make her pregnancy go away?"

Amber felt her heart sink as Alisa checked in with John.

"I don't want to get rid of her pregnancy...not yet, anyway," John said.

Alisa shook her head. "No, she'll stay pregnant. You can check in again at another time and maybe I can undo the previous magic. You may call me Alisa, by the way."

"Nice to meet you, Alisa," Elizabeth nodded, rubbing her belly. "You certainly made an appropriate entrance at a baby shower."
